meanings.definition: A political community founded for the common good.
meanings.sent1: The commonwealth worked together to improve the local parks.
meanings.sent2: The commonwealth of nations met to discuss trade agreements.
meanings.sent3: The commonwealth decided to have a picnic to discuss serious matters.
meanings.sent4: The commonwealth was a garden where ideas bloomed and flourished.
meanings.sent5: The commonwealth was a treasure trove of shared resources.

meanings.definition: A group of countries or states that have political or economic connections with each other.
meanings.sent1: The commonwealth of nations collaborated on environmental policies.
meanings.sent2: The commonwealth was formed to promote trade among member states.
meanings.sent3: The commonwealth organized a potluck to celebrate unity.
meanings.sent4: The commonwealth was a web of interconnected nations.
meanings.sent5: The commonwealth was a tapestry of diverse cultures.

meanings.definition: The people of a nation or state; the body politic.
meanings.sent1: The commonwealth voted for a new leader.
meanings.sent2: The commonwealth celebrated its cultural heritage.
meanings.sent3: The commonwealth threw a party to elect a mascot.
meanings.sent4: The commonwealth was a living, breathing entity.
meanings.sent5: The commonwealth was a vibrant tapestry of individuals.
